task: Move all non-white plastic cups to the right side of the table.
description: The initial state shows six plastic cups on a table: one yellow, two purple, one pink, and one blue. The final state shows the same cups, but they are all moved to the right side of the table. The white cups remain in their original positions.
plan: 1. **Step 1:** Move the yellow cup to the right side of the table. 2. **Step 2:** Move the pink cup to the right side of the table. 3. **Step 3:** Move the purple cup to the right side of the table. 4. **Step 4:** Move the blue cup to the right side of the table.  ### Planning Reasoning: The task requires moving all non-white cups to the right side of the table. The white cups are not part of the task, so they remain stationary. By moving the non-white cups to the right, we achieve the desired final state where all cups are aligned on the right side of the table.  ### Step-by-Step Execution:
